descriptions: Added auto-detection system for Target scripts (ox_target, qtarget, qb-target) in Config
Added Config.UseRPName option to toggle between Roleplay Names and Steam Names in lobby/invites
Added automatic cleanup of all entities (peds, vehicles, props, blips) on resource restart/stop
Implemented robust Character Name display system (Server-side caching + Client-side fallback helper)
Fixed critical bug with qb-target interactions where valid targets were not clickable (collision issue)
Fixed script error in Target callback (attempt to index number value) by normalizing target data
Fixed Put newspapers text appearing on mailboxes when player is not carrying newspapers
Fixed compatibility issue with Target.addEntity function signature
Fixed player name display in Lobby/Team menu showing Steam Name instead of RP Name
Replaced direct LocalPlayer state checks with wrapper functions for better framework compatibility
